name: Musical Bubble Shooter🎹
description:
This is a relaxing bubble game that makes a mallet sound 🎵 each time you take out a bubble. If you take out many bubbles, it will combine into a melody.
The melodies are editable in melody editor.

This bubble game has:

  • 🍀-Beautiful realtime 2D light effect & particle effect.
  • 🍀-8 relaxing piano songs.
  • 🍀-Editable melody sound effect.
  • 🍀-3000 different stages.
  • 🍀-3 types of super bubbles that might help you clear difficult stages

My Homepage:
https://tepputeppu.neocities.org/

What You Will Get: android version apk + pc version exe
